scenario_text.value: I don’t think there’s anyone here.

Okay... Then we ought to move on
somewhere else, and quick.
Everyone’s here, so it’ll be okay.

Besides, everyone else will get worked up if
you start panicking.
You’re right... Sorry, Agumon. And thanks.
Don’t sweat it! C’mon, let’s go.
Let’s keep a cool head, Takuma.
